name: places/ChIJaeVY951YwokRfPUSDmNfBvc
formattedAddress: 36 W 96th St, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 36 W 96th St, New York, NY 10025-6558, USA

originalText.text:
We had our UWS pre-war apartment renovated by Jakub and team in June to September 2022. He stayed on budget, and finished on time, which was incredible considering the amount of work it turned out to be.
On top of that, he was an absolute pleasure to work with. Honest, responsive, easy going, and a good sense of humor.
1,000/10 would recommend to anyone.

The work we had done included:
Gutting and rebuilding our existing bathroom, including moving all fixtures
Adding an entirely new bathroom (we're now a 2 bathroom unit!)
Adding washer/dryer to the unit, including a new closet for it
Adding and removing walls and doors to change our floor plan
Adding closets
Refinishing all walls, including all new molding (we had our picture frame wall moldings replaced and it looks great!)
New electric in the whole unit
New flooring throughout
A built in 'bar' with a counter top, cabinets and shelves.

Basically a gut renovation except for the kitchen. We didn't know what we were getting involved with when we started, but Jakub made it a lot easier than it could have been.

Included are photos of our redone bathroom (marble)
And entirely new second bathroom (blue/white hex with herringbone wall panels)

originalText.text:
I hired Home Solutions to completely renovate my bathroom.
When Jakub came to look at it I got the feeling I was dealing with some who was honest and reliable, unlike a previous contractor I had hired.  He gave me a price that included all building requirements and included the possibility of water damage.  And the final cost was exactly what he said it would be.
His people were here every day and the work they did was high quality.
He was easily reached for questions or issues and was always wiling to look at changes.
Not only would I recommend him but I am planning to renovate my kitchen next year and I will hire him again.

originalText.text: When we moved to our new coop on the UWS, we needed some work to make it livable: painting throughout, installation of two light fixtures, a new radiator enclosure, and the construction of a 9 ft long bookcase with cabinets below. Jakub and crew were punctual, neat and extremely cooperative. The millwork was excellent. The project came in on time and on budget. We are extremely happy with their work and highly recommend them.

originalText.text:
I had a small remodeling project (replacement of bathroom sink and vanity), and contacted a host of contractors for months on end.  I had no “takers” because most NYC contractors considered it not to be worth their time or energy.
Crestfallen, I turned to YELP, and found HOME SOLUTIONS NYC.
Not only did Jakub let me know that he could in fact DO this small (but important to me) job (which he  scheduled in between other projects), but every aspect of working with him and his team (Jane in the back office and Michael, his incredibly skilled #2 the day of the job) was an absolute pleasure.  My project was executed flawlessly by true professionals.

Don’t waste your time with any other contractor.  HOME SOLUTIONS NYC ROCKS!

originalText.text: Jakub & the Home Solutions team were an excellent selection for my renovation project. I most appreciated their consistent responsiveness to any questions or concerns. They were accommodating and helpful and I really appreciated the care they took with complex building co-op requirements and rules. I would recommend and use them again without question.
